instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928 distorted graphics and freezing running unigine valley
threads.message: There are no signs of spillage it works fine until I run benchmark then it gets distorted graphics and freezes/crashes. Is this  a known issue with this model?

threads.title: 820-00928 distorted graphics and freezing running unigine valley
threads.message: Check what happens testing with external monitor connected.

threads.title: 820-00928 distorted graphics and freezing running unigine valley
820-00928 distorted graphics and freezing running unigine valley
threads.message:
Then should be GPU issue.
GPU is activated when Unigine is running, or external monitor connected.

threads.title: 820-00928 distorted graphics and freezing running unigine valley
threads.message: Is this common on this model ? any Apple recall programs on them?.

threads.title: 820-00928 distorted graphics and freezing running unigine valley
threads.message: No idea really, consult with Apple before touching the board.
